decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Design and Access Statement, 16013-13-ES-GA, 16013-13-E-GA, 16013-13-B-GA, 16013-13-B-A, 16013-13-B-1. Received: 9 December 2016.
Location plan: within 101D. Amended plans: 101D, 111E, 102E. Received: 6 January 2017) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the walls of the extension hereby approved without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
description: Erection of a single storey rear extension with a roof lantern, alterations to first floor rear window to french doors and juilette balcony, erection of a rear roof extension with juilette balcony and two front roof windows to the house
